name: Open Flame
description:
Open flame is a fiery puzzle game. Rotate the dice to match their numbers and spread the flame to make your way to the exit. But be careful not to burn the wrong die or you may be stuck forever.

This game was made for the GMTK game jam in 48 hours.

View the GitHub for this project here.

Remember if you get stuck you can press R to restart the level.

Thanks for playing.
